138a6: rab 'gyung bang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dngos po meng bstong pa nyid la mngon par chags pa med dam zhes dngos po med pa stong pa nyid la byang chub sems dpa' sem dpa' ma sa yongs su gtas
138a7: par bya'o/ / raba'i bor bar chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ngo ba nyid stong pa nyid la mngon par chags pa med dam zhes ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' mnas yongs
138a8: brtag par bya'o/ / rab 'bar bar du ba sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la mngon par chags pa med dam zhes dngos po yang pa' ngo bo nyid snyed pa nyid la byang chub

138b1: sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yongs su brtag par bya'o/ / rab 'bor bang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams la mngon par chags pa med dam zhes dran pa nye bar gzhag
138b2: rngams la ba chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yongs su brtag par bya'o/ / rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yang dag par spong ba rnams la mngon par chags pa med dam zhes yang dag par
138b3: spong ba rnams la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yongs su brtag par bya'o/ / rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams la mngon par chags pa med papa zhes rdzu 'phrul
138b4: gyi rkang pa rnams la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yongs su brtag par bya'o/ / rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dbang po rnams la mngon par chags pa med dam zhes dbang po rnams
138b5: la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yongs su brtag par bya'o/ / rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po stobs rnams la mngon par chags pa med dam zhes stobs rnams la bang chub sems
138b6: dpa' sems dpa' chen po yongs su brtag par bya'o/ / rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byang chub kyi yan lag rnams la mngon par chags pa med dam zhes byang chub kyi yan la rnams la byang
138b7: dab sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yongs su brtag par bya'o/ / rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la mngon par chags pa med dma'as 'phags
138b8: pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yongs su brtag par bya'o/ / rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams la mdzond par chags

139a1: pa med dam zhes 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yongs su martag par bya'o/ / rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' cher
139a2: tan rnams la mngon par rags pa med dam zhes bsam gtan rnams la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yongs su gartag par bya'o/ / rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po med pa
139a3: pa rnams la mngon par chags pa med dam zhes tshad med pa rnams la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yongs su brtag par bya'o/ / rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gzugs ma
139a4: pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la mngon par chags pa med dam zhes gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yongs su brtag par bya'o/ / rab 'bor pa
139a5: da mas dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam par thar pa rnams la mngon par chags pa med dam zhes rnam par thar pa rnams la byang chub sems dasa' sems dpa' chen po yongs su brtag par bya'o/ /
139a6: 'di dbang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la mngon par chags pa med dal shes makar gyis gnas pa'i sems par 'jug pa thams la byang chul
139a7: dpa' sems dpa' chen po yongs su brtag par bya'o/ / rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa sems dpa' chen po rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid da mtshan pa med pa dang smon pa med pal bangor par chags pa
139a8: bam zhes rnam par thar pa'i sa stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma med pa dang smon pa med pa la byang chums pas dpa' sems dpa' chen po yongs su brtag par bya'o/ / rab 'khor ba tub sems dpa' sems

139b1: pa mngon par shes pa rnang la mngon par chags pa med dam zhes mngon par shes pa rnams la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yongs su brtag par bya'o/ / rab 'byor byang chub se
139b2: dpa' sems dpa' chen po ti nge 'dzin rnams la mngon par chags pa med dam zhes ting nge 'dzin rnams la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yongs su brtag par bya'o/ / rab 'byor byang chu
139b3: sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gzungs kyi sgo rnams la mngon par chags pa med dam zhes gzungs kyi sgo rnams la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yongs su brtag par bya'o/ / rab 'byor
139b4: d ub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams la mngon par chags pa med dam zhes de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
139b5: yongs su brtag par bya'o/ / rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mi 'jigs pa rnams la mngon par chags pa med dam zhes mi 'jigs pa rnams la byang chub sems dpa' sems dang
139b6: chen po yongs su brtag par bya'o/ / rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po so so yang dag par rig pa rnams la mngon par chags pa med dam zhes so so yang pa rig pa rnams la bang
139b7: sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yongs su brtag par bya'o/ / rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa chen po la mngon par chags pa med dam zhes byams pa na sel byang chub sems
139b8: dpa' sems dpa' chen po yongs su brtag par bya'o/ / rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po snying rje chen po la mngon par chags pa med dam zhes snying rje chen po la byang chub sems dpa' sems

140a1: 'arar pa yongs pa brtag par bya'o/ / rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams la mngon par chags pa med ngam zhes sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres
140a2: ba ba sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yongs su brtag par bya'o/ / rab 'bor bang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad shes pa nyid la mngon par chags pa med dam zhes thams cad
140a3: pa rang la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' che po yongs su brtag par bya'o/ / rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po las gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid la mngon par chags pa med ngas shes las gyi
140a4: pashes pa nyid la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yongs su brtag par bya'o/ / rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la sa ngan par chags pa med da
140a5: sarnas pa thams cad mkhan pa nyid la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yongs su brtag par bya'o/ / // shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa/ bas po nyes pargyanyi shu lnga pa
140a6: ser mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa zab mo 'di la spong ba'i tshe/ pha rol gyis smras pa dang / pha rol gyis bstan pa la snying por mi lta 'as phyir mi ldog pa'i
140a7: dang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa za' so 'di la spong ba'i tshe/ pha rol gyis dang pas mi 'gro'am/ pir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen por
140a8: rab kyi pha ral du phyin pa zab ma 'di la spong ba'i tshe/ 'dod chags dang bcas pa'i sems bzhed pas 'phrogs pa ma yin nas/ zhe sdang dang bcas pa'i sems bskyod pas 'phrogs pa ma yin nas/ gtel ga

140b1: pa' sem pa bskyed pas 'phrogs pa ma yin nas/ phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de shes rab kyi pha rol dpyad pa zab mo 'di la spong pa'i cha sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin
140b2: bral bar ma gyur tam/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang bral bar ma gyur tas/ bzod pa'i pha rol du phyin pa dang bral bar ma gyur ta ma/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang bral bar ma gyur tam/ kha
140b3: ga kye pa ral du phyin pa dang bral bar ma gyur tam/ shes rab kyi pha rol dper ba dang bral bar ma gyur tam zhes yongs su brtag par bya ste/ gal te phyir la ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
140b4: po'i shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa zab mo 'di 'chad pa'i tshe/ mi 'jigs mi sdang skrag par mi 'gyur la/ zhum pa dang yongs su zhum par mi 'gyur zhing / de'i yid phyir nur bar mi 'gyur te/ shes rab kyi par
140b5: dpe bza' ma 'di thos par dga' la/ thos nas kyang 'dzin cing 'chang la/ klog cing kun chub par byed pa/ tshul bzhin du yid la byed cing / de bzhin nyid du nan tan byed ra/ rab 'byor ba rta sems
140b6: sa pas dpa' chen po ngas ni sngon gyi mthar yang shes rab kyi pha rol dpyin pa zab mo 'di yongs su dris shing / yongs su brtag par bas pa dang / bzung zhing bcangs te kar zab par byas dam pa'i rang
140b7: yid la byas par rig par bya'o/ / de tsa'i b.ra'am/ de ni 'di ltar phyir pa ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa zab sa 'anga'ar ba mas 'jigs pa
140b8: skrag par mi 'gyur la/ zhus par ma 'gyur/ yongs su zhus par mi 'gyur zhing / de'i yid phyir mi ldog la/ ces nas kyang gong du 'dzin cing 'chang la/ sro ga cing kar chub par byed // tshul ba 'du yang la byang

141a1: phyir ro/ / gsol pa bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang shes rab kyi pha rol dpya ba lo 'di bstar pa'i ma/ sa 'jigs mi sapar mi 'gyur 'i
141a2: mi gyur/ yong dang/ ma ldar 'das bya chubasam sanga' sems dpa' chen po des shes rab sa par pa per bzab pa 'di rje lta par@
141a3: kyis bka' stsal pa/ bang da sems pa'asems dpa' ldan pa de sarmas pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la gzhol ba'i bsas par shes ra kyi pha rol du phyin pa zab pa 'di brtag par bya
141a4: bcom ldan 'das ji ltar ra rnas pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la gzhol ba'i bags pas/ bang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du yin pa zab mo 'di rtog pa lagasabacos ldan
141a5: sa bka' stsal pa/ raba' ba stong pa nyid la gzhol na'i bsam pas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa zab mo 'di la rtog pa yin/ rab 'byor mtshanas med pa la
141a6: 'ol ba'i bsam pas ban bsems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa zab mo 'di la rtag pa yin/ rab 'byor smon pa med pa la gzhol ba'i bsam pas ba dub sem
141a7: d pa' ma po shes rab kyis la med pa zab po 'di la rtog pa yin rab 'bor nam mkha' la gzhol pa'i bsam pas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab sa par la dpa da
141a8: 'di la rtog pa yin/ rab 'byo smra ba med pa la gzhol ba'i bas lams ba gas sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pa shes rab kyi pha rol du yin pa zab so 'dis rtog pa yin pa' med

141b1: la gzhol ba'i bsam pos byang chub sebs dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa zab mo 'di la rtog pa yin/ rab 'byor kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa la gzhal ba'i bsam pas
141b2: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa zab mo 'di la rtog pa yin/ rab 'byor rnam par byang ba med pa la gzhol ba'i bsam pas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes
141b3: rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa zab mo 'di lo rtog pa yin/ rab 'byor de bzhin nyid la gzhol ba'i bsam pas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol dbyin pa zab mo 'di la rtog pa yin/ rab 'byor chos
141b4: kye dbyings la gzhol ba'i bsam pas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'i rlan po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa zab mo 'di la rtog pa yin/ rab 'byor yang dag pa'i mtha' la gzhol ba'i bsam pas byang chub sems
141b5: dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa zab mo'ang la rtag pa yin/ rab 'byor mnyam pa nyid la gzhol ba'i bsam pas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi
141b6: rel daphyin pa zab mo 'di la rtog pa yin/ rab 'byor bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings la gzhol ba'i bsam pas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa zab po 'di la rtog
141b7: pa yid/ rab 'bor mngon par 'angabya ba med pa la gzhol ba'i bas sa byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pa rol mir pa zab mo 'di la rtog pa yin/ rab 'byong rmi lam la ga 'al ba bas
141b8: b as byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa zab mo 'di la rtog pa yin rab 'a bor gzugs padan la gzhal ba'ab pas byang chub sams dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi sa

142a1: ral dupa pa zab sa 'di la rtog pa yin/ rab 'byor sgru ba rnyan la gzhal ba' bsam pas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi par ya ben pa zab mo'i
142a2: yin/ 'byoraka t+pa la gzhal ba'i bsam pas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa zab mo 'dal rtag pa yin/ rab 'byor rna ma la gzhol ba' bas
142a3: dpa' sems dpe po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa zab mo 'ang la rtog pa yin/ rab 'byor sprul pa la gzhol ba'i bsam pas par chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha
142a4: pa zab mo 'ang la rtog pa yin no/ / gsel pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ltar stong pa nyid la gzhol ba'i bsam pas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pa shes rab kyi pha ral du phyin pa zab ma'
142a5: lartag par 'gyur/ mtshan ma med pa la gzhal ba'i bsam pas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pa rol du min pa rab sa 'di la rtag par 'gyur/ smon pa mang pa la gzhal
142a6: mas pa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol daphyin pa zab mo 'di la rtog par 'gyur/ nam mkha' la gzhol ba'i bsam pas byang chub sems dpa' sems
142a7: sa rab sa papo 'ad la rtog par 'gyur/ skyeb ma mchis pa la gzhal ba'i bsamapas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab sa par la ben bzab ma
142a8: 'gyur/ 'gag pal gzhal ba'i bsam pas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa zab sa 'di la rtog par 'bar/ na na tshan mongs pa dang /

142b1: ma ris pa la gzhol ba'i bsam pas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa zab mo 'di la rtog par 'gyur/ de bzhin nyid la gzhal ba'i bsam pas byang chub sems dpa' sam/
142b2: dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa zab mo 'di la rtog par 'gyur/ chos kyi dbyings la gzhol ba'i bsam pas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pa ral du phyin pa zab ma 'ang la rtog par
142b3: 'gar/ yang dag pa'i mtha' la gzhol ba'i bsam pas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol da pan pa zab mo 'di la rtog par 'gyur/ mnyam pa nyid la gzhol ba'i bsamapas bang rab
142b4: sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa zab mo 'di la rtog par 'gyur/ bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings la gzhol ba'i bsam pas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes pa
142b5: kyi pha rol du phyin pa zab mo 'di la rtog par 'gyur/ mngon par 'du bgyi bam mchis pa la gzhol ba'i bsam pas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa zab mo'ang la rtog pa
142b6: 'brung ri lam la gzhal ba'i bsam pas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa zab mi 'di la rtog par 'gyur/ gzugs brtan la gzhol ba'i bsam pas byang rab
142b7: sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa zab mo 'di la rtog par 'gyur/ sgra brnyan la gzhol ba'i bsam pas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du min pa zab mo
142b8: 'di la rtog par 'gyur/ rig rgyul gzhol ba'i bsam pas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa zab mo 'di la rtog par 'gyur/ skum la gzhol ba'i bas la pas byang chub ser

143a1: dpa' sams dpa' chen pags raba'i pha la du zin pa zab sa 'di la nag par 'gyur/ sprul pa la gnas pa'i bsam pas byang rdzas pa sadapa' thams thamams dag dpags pargyas
143a2: du yin pa zab lo 'di la rtog par 'gyur na/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gzugs la rtog pa lags sam/ tshor pa la rtog pa lagams pa/ 'du shes la rtog pa lags sa pa/ 'du byed
143a3: la rtog pa lags pa la/ rnam par shes pa la rtag pa lags pa pa/ mig la rtag pa lags sam/ rna ba la rtog pa lags sam/ sA la rtog pa lags 'am/ lha la rtog pa lags sa ma/ lu ba la rtog pa lags pa pa
143a4: la rtog pa lags sam/ gzugs la rtog pa lags sa pa/ sgra la rtog pa lags sam/ dri la rtog pa lags sam/ ro la rtog pa lags sam/ reg la rtog pa lags sam/ chos la rtog pa lags sam/ yig gardang
143a5: par shes pa la rtog pa lags sam/ rna ba'i rnam par shes pa la rtog pa lags sam/ gA'i rnam par shes pa la rtog pa lagags pa/ lce'i rnam par shes pa la rtog pa lags sa pa/ lus kyi rnam par shes pa la
143a6: pa lags sam/ yid kyi rnam par shes pa la rtog pa lagasas la/ mig gi 'dus te reg pa la rtog pa lags mam/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa la rtog pa lags sam/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa la rtog pa lags sa
143a7: me'i 'dus te reg pa la rtog pa lags sam/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa la rtog pa lags sam/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa la rtag pa lags sam/ mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba sa rtog pa lags pa
143a8: rna' 'dus te ga pa'i rkyen gyis char ba la rtog pa lags sam/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba la rtog pa lags sam/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshang ba la rtog pa lags sam/ lus kyi 'dus tar

143b1: pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba la rtog pa lags sam/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i gyen gyis tshor ba la rtog pa lags sam/ sa'i khams la rtog pa lagasas pa/ chu'i khams la rtog pa lags sa pa/ me'i khams la rtog pa laH
143b2: sam/ rlung gi khalas la rtog pa lags sam/ nam mkha'i khams la rtog pa lags sam/ rnam par shes pa'i khams la rtog pa lags sam/ ma rig pa la rtog pa lag bsam/ 'du byad la rtog pa lagasas pa/ nam
143b3: par shes pa la rtog pa lags sam/ ming dang gzugs la rtog pa lags sam/ skye mched drug la rtog pa lags sam/ reg pa la rtog pa lags sam/ tshor ba la rtog pa lags sam/ sred pa la rtog pa lags sam/ len pa la
143b4: rtog pa lags sam/ srid pa la rtog pa lags sam/ skye ba la rtog pa lags sam/ rga shil rtog pa lags sa pa/ sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa la rtog pa lagasas ma tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa la rtog pa lags pa ma
143b5: bzod pa'i pha rol du phyin pa la rtog pa lags pa pa/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol du phyin pa pa rtog pa lags sam bsapa gtan gyi pha rol du phyin pa la rtog pa lagasas pa shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la rtog pa lags sam/ dang
143b6: stong pa nyid la rtag pa lags sam/ gyi stong pa nyid la rtog pa lags sam/ phyi nang stong pa nyid la rtog pa lags sam/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid la rtog pa lags sam/ chen po stong pa nyid la rtog pa lags pa pa/
143b7: don dam pa stong pa nyid la rtog pa lags sam/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid la rtog pa lags sam/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid la rtog pa lags sam/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid la rtog pa lags sa pa// thog
143b8: ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid la rtog pa lags sam/ dor ba med pa stong pa nyid la rtog pa lags sam/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid la rtog pa lags sa pa/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid la rtog pa lags sam/

144a1: rang ga marar shang snang pa'i la rtag pa lagasas pa/ mi dmigs pa stong pa 'ad la rtog pa lags sapa/ dngos pa med pa skang pa nyid lartag pa lagasas pa/ ro ba da /
144a2: dngos po med pa'ang ba nyid stong pa nyid la rtog pa lags sam/ dran nye bar gzhag pa rnams la rtog pa lags sa pa/ yang dag par spang ba rnams la rtog pa lagasas pa/ rdza 'phrul gyi gang pa
144a3: tshig pa lags sam/ dbang po rnams la rtog pa lagasas pa/ stobs rnams la chag pa lags sam/ byang chub sa yan lag rnams la rtog pa lagasas pa/ 'phags pa'al ma yan lag btang pa la ga pal
144a4: pa/ 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams la rtog pa lags sam/ bsam gtan rnams la rtog pa lags sam/ tshad med pa rnams la rtog pa lags sa pa/ gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rtog
144a5: gsas pa/ rnam par thar pa rnams la rtog pa lags sam/ mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la rtog pa lags sam/ rnam par thar pa'i sa stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma ma
144a6: pa lags sam/ mngon par shes pa rnams la rtog pa lags sam/ ting nge 'dzin rnams la rtog pa lags sam/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams la rtog pa lags sa pa/ de ba'adag she
144a7: pa lags sam/ 'jigs pa rnams la rtog pa lags sam/ so so yang dag par rig pa rnams la rtog pa lags sam/ byams pa chen po la rtog pa lags sam/
144a8: sargyas kyi chos ma 'das pa rnams la rtog pa lagasas pa/ thams cad shes pa nyid la rtog pa lags sam/ lam gyi rnam pa shes pa'i ga pa lags sapa/ rnam pa thams cad ma bya

144b1: lags sam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni gzugs la rtog pa pa yin no// tshor ba la rtog pa ma yin no// 'du shes la tog
144b2: ro/ / 'du byed la rtog pa ma yin no// rnam par shes pa la rtog pa ma yin no// mig la rtog pa ma yin no// rna ba la rtog pa ma yin no// snal ro pa ma yin no// kye la rtog pa ma yin no//
144b3: la rtog pa ma yin no// yid la rtog pa ma yin no// gzugs la rtog pa ma yin no// sgra la rtog pa ma yin no// dri la rtog pa ma yin no// ro la rtog pa ma yin de// ga la log pa ma yin no// chos la rtog
144b4: ma yin no/ / mig gi rnam par shes pa la rtog pa ma yin no// rna ba'i rnam par shes pa la rtog pa ma yin no// sna'i rnam par shes pa la rtog pa yin no// lha'i rnam par shes pa la rtog pa ma yin no//
144b5: sa kyi rnam par shes pa la rtog pa ma yin no// yid kyi rnam par shes pa la rtag pa ma yin no// mig gi 'dris te reg pa la rtog pa ma yin no// rna ba'i 'das te reg pa la rtog pa yin no// sna'i
144b6: te reg pa la rtog pa ma yin no/ / lce'i 'dus te reg pa la rtog pa ma yin no// las kyi 'dus te reg pa la rtog pa ma yin no// yid kyi 'das te reg pa la rtog pa ma yin no// mig gi 'dras te dag
144b7: pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba la rtog pa ma yin no/ / rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba la rtog pa ma yin no// sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba la rtog pa ma yin no// lce'i 'dus te dag pa'i rkyen
144b8: gyis tshor pa la rtog pa ma yin no/ / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba la rtog pa ma yin no// yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor pa la rtog pa ma yin no// sa'i khams la rtog pa ma yin no// /

145a1: 'i kham la rtag pa pa yin no// me'i khams la rtog pa ma yin no// rung gi khams la rtog pa ma yin no// nam mkha' khams pa rtog pa // gas pa'i 'a
145a2: rtog pa ma yin no/ / ba~M rig pa la rtog pa ma yin na// 'ang byed la rtog pa ma yin no// rnam par shes pa la rtog pa ma yin no// ming dang gzugs la rtog pa ma yin no// ma ngag
145a3: yin/ pa la rtag pa ma yin no// ba la rtog pa ma yin no// sri pa la rtog pas yin no// len pa la rtog pa sa yin no// sring pa la rtog pas

145a8: zang pa nyid la rtog pa ma yin no/ / der rab med pa stong pa nyid la rtog pa ma yin no// rang bzhin stong pa nyid la rtog pa ma yin no// chos thams cad stong pa nyid 'artog pa ma yin no// da

145b1: nyid la rtog pa ma yin no/ / mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid la rtog pa ma yin no// dngos po med pa stong pa nyid la rtog pa ma yin no// ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la rtog pa ma yin no// dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid
145b2: nyid la rtog pa ma yin no/ / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams la rtog pa ma yin no// yang dag par spong ba rnams la rtog pa ma yin no// rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams la rtog pa ma yin no// dbang po rnams la
145b3: rtog pa ma yin no/ / stobs rnams la rtog pa ma yin no// byang chub kyi yan lag rnams la rtag pa ma yin no// 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la rtog pa ma yin no// 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams la

145b5: rtog pa pa yin no/ / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la rtog pa ma yin no// rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma med pa dang smon pa med pa la rtog pa ma yin no// mngon par shes parnam
145b6: la rtog pa ma yin no/ / ting nge 'dzin dmas la rtog pa ma yin no// gzungs kyi sgo rnams la rtog pa ma yin no// de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams la rtog pa ma yin no// mi 'jigs pa na brtag ya
145b7: no/ / so so yang dag par rig pa rnams la rtog pa pa yin no// byams pa chen po la rtog pa ma yin no// snying rje chen po la rtog pa ma yin no// sangs kas kyi chos ma 'dres pa 'aro ma yin no//

147a1: rkang pa rnams kyim ma yin no/ / dbang pa las kyis ma yin na// stobs rnams kas ma yin no// byang chub kyi yan lag rnams kyis la yin no// 'phags pa'i lam ya gag btang ba

149a1: nyid do/ / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do// 'phags pa'i bden pa nyid kyang rnam pa thabs cad bakhyen pa nyid do// zas pa gtan dkyang rnam pa thabs cad
149a2: mkhyen pa nyid do/ / tshad med pa nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do// gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ngo // rnab par thar pa nyid kyang rnam pa thams nang /
149a3: panyid do// mthar byas gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do// rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyi dang mtshan ma med pa dang smon pa nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad ma byed pa da /
149a4: mngon par shes pa nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do// ting nge 'dzin nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do// gzungs kyi sgo nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad bakhyen pa nyid do// de bzhin gshegs pa'i
149a5: stobs nyid kyang zab pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do/ / mi 'jigs pa nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do// so so yang dag par rig pa nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do// byams pa chen po
149a6: nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do/ / snying rje chen po nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do// sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do// de ci'i phyir zher/
149a7: thong don 'di ltar gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de na de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o// tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rngam pa thams cad
149a8: pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa der de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o/ / 'du shes kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad pa khyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin paded de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o//

149b1: bang ti dbang yid pa dang / ras sams cadam par panyid tha das gang ba dathad na thadang 'dag napa ba gas papa can kya bang pa dag ma gas kya shad
149b2: nyid cing ba'i nying gang yang pa de rang ba'ang nyid gcig pa'o/ / thig gi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / ram pa thams cad pa khyen pa cad kyi pa'ang 'a gang yan bde rang ban tha~Mng gcig 'o// rab nga
149b3: bzhidun gang yin pa dang / ram pathapa yang mkhyer pa nyid kyid ba na dgang ya pa den de bzhin nyid gtsug pa'o// rdza dri bzhi ni dgang pa pa dang / rnam pa thams par mkhyen pa ny-ing na /
149b4: ya bden de ba'i nyid gcig pa'o// lce'ade bzhid nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o// lus kyi bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang /
149b5: pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid pa de bzhar nyid gang yang bdor nga bzhin nyid gtsag pa'o// yid kyi bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kying bzhin nye gang yin pa ra de bzhida'ang ga
149b6: pa'o/ / gzugs kyi de ba'ang 'ang gang yan pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang ba' ting gang yir bder de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o// sgra 'di bzhir nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad pa'ar ba nyid
149b7: debazhin nyid gang led pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o/ / dra'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyer panying gyi de bzhin nyid geng yi pa de de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o// ngo ba' da gang
149b8: padang / rnab pa thams cad mabyar pa nyid kyang bzhin nyid gang yin bden nga bzhin nyid gcig pa'o// reg ga dpa' da nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad ma byon pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni bzhin

150a2: a
150a3: s a

150a8: gang yin pa na de bzhin nyid bcig pa'o/ / lu'i 'das dag pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang bzhan nga gang ya nga
