151a1: ga khams kyi de bzhin nyid kar yod pa dang / rngab pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o// nam mkha'i khams kyi ba'ang 'ang gang yin pa dang / rngam pan pa
151a2: cad bakhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid dpa ra de bzhin zhi gcig pa'o/ / rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de ba'amanyang gang yin pa ra ba'
151a3: ka pa'o/ / ma rig pa'i nga bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / ral pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o// 'du byed kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnab pa thams
151a4: nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o/ / rnab par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yon pa ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o// mid da
151a5: gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams pa mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o// skye mched drug gi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyed
151a6: kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhan nyid gcig pa'o/ / reg pa'i de bzhin nyir gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o// tshor ba'i deban
151a7: gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen panyid de bzhin nyid gang bad pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o// sred pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi debazhan nyid gang yi
151a8: de de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o/ / len pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thamasacad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o// srid pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam

151b1: sa cam tang kyang bzha bar ma pa na bzhan gcag pa thar ba na ga mang pa dang / rnam pa thams cad pamapad dpa nyi gang yi pa da ba zhi nyang ga
151b2: ga ma pa nga/ rnam pa thams cad mtha pa pa ma da pa' ga// rgyan pa phyin pa 'ad /
151b3: pa bya ba'ang ga sar bden canan kyad gcag pa'o// tshul thams kyi yang gyu pa'i ban ci gang yin pa dang / rnas thathams cad mkhyen pan bya pa' dgang ya dag
151b4: 'apar sadupa pa'ade ba'angam gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mabyed pa nyid thar ban yang gang yin pa ma bzhan cid 'acig pa'o// brtson 'grus bya pa rol phyid pa dba'an 'a
151b5: dang / dpa thams cad mthar pa cad kyang cazhan ca gang yin pa na than cad gcaga'o// bam pa gtan tsapa ma du gyun pa'i ca shA gang me pa dang / rnam pamams das khyen pa nyi ban
151b6: gang yid pa ring ban nying gcig pal/ / shes rabs pa rol dpyad pa'i de ba' tid gang me 'ang / ras bathas cad mkhyer patang byar ba'ang nya gang ya pa de de bzhin nyi gcig pa'o// nang
151b7: pa ga yi pa dang / rnam thathams cad bakhyen pa shi kyang ba'ing ba dag pa 'i de ba gachag la// byethong pa' dkyar ban pa gang yin pa dang / rnam pams
151b8: dbyung ba'ang nyang gang yin pa den dpa'an nyid gcig pa'o/ / byi nang stong pa nyid bde bzhin nying gang yang bdapa ram bathams cad mkhyen pa'ing kyi de ba'im pa gang me bden ba 'an 6/

152a1: stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin 'di gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin bde na de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o// chen po stong pa 'i
152a2: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ka de bzhin 'ad gang yar bden nga bzhin nyid gcig pa'o/ / don dam pastong pa nyid kyang bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa rnams dang malen pa 'ang kyang banyan dag
152a3: de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o/ / 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyang bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pada' de bzhin 'a gcag pa'o// 'dus ma byas te/
152a4: de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa nad bzhin nyid gcig pa'o// mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyang bzhin nyid gang yan pa dang / rnam pa
152a5: thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de na de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o/ / thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin
152a6: gang yin pa de med bzhin nyid gcig pa'o/ / dor ba med pa stong pa 'ad kyang bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o/
152a7: rang bzhan stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa'i kyang bzhin cid gang yin pa nang bzhin nyid gcig pa'o// chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyi gang
152a8: dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de na de bzhin nyid gcag pa'o// rangag patshan nyid snang pa nyid kyang bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad pa 'a

152b1: kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o/ / mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa'i da kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de nang de bzhin nyid gcig
152b2: pa'o/ / dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o// ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang /
152b3: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang bzhin nyid gang yin pa de na de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o// dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de
152b4: bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin 'di gcig pa'o/ / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de na de bzhin nyid dgacag 'o// yang dag par spong ba rnams
152b5: kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o// rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mnyen
152b6: pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de med bzhin nyid gcig pa'o/ / dbang po rnams kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o//
152b7: stobs rnams kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o// byang chub kyi yan pa ga rnams kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam
152b8: pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o/ / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin

153a1: nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o/ / 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa da bzhin da
153a2: bsam gtan rnams kyi de bzhin 'ang nga yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin par ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o// tshad med pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang rnam pa
153a3: thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o/ / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa
153a4: de bzhin nyid gang yin pa ba ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o/ / rnam par thar pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid ga pa yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid ga
153a5: pa'o/ mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dku'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o// rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa
153a6: nyid dang mtshan ma med pa dang smon pa med pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o// mngon par shes pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid gang
153a7: yang pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o// ting nge 'dzin rnams kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kya pa/
153a8: nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o// gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o// de bzhin//

153b1: gshegs pa'i stobs rnams kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa yo gas pa rnam bzhina'i
153b2: gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o// so so yang dag par rig pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pasams cad mkhyen pa
153b3: nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o/ / byams pa chen po'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pal// se
153b4: chen pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o// sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyang de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang
153b5: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o/ / shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa las le'u sum bcu brgyad do// /
153b6: shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa// bam po nyes brgya nyi shu drug pa/ de nas 'dod pa na spyod pa dang / gzugs yod pa na spyod pa'i lha'i bu rnams lnga rdzas kyi tsan dan gyi phye ma dang / lha rdzas kyir
153b7: pang pa la dang / pad mo dang ku mu da dang bran da ri ka mang po khyer te/ bcom ldan 'das gang na ba de lags su 'thor bar gyur to// gtor nas bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dong ste/ bcom ldan 'das
153b8: zhabs gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal nas/ phyogs gcig tu 'khod do// 'khod nas 'dod pa na spyod pa dang / gzugs yod pa na spyod pa'i lha'i bu de dag gis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to//

154a1: bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa zab mo 'di las/ 'di skad du gzugs nyid rnam pa thams cad
154a2: mkhyen pa ste/ rdal ba thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang gzugs so// tshor ba nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang tshor ba'o// 'du shes nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa
154a3: thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang 'du shes so/ / 'du byed nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang 'du byed do// rnam par shes pa nyid rnam pa thams cad pa'ar pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad
154a4: mkhyen pa nyid kyang rnam par shes pa'o/ / mig nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang mig go/ rna ba nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad pa len pa nyid kyang rna ba
154a5: sde nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang snga'o// lce nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyer pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang lce'o// lus nyid rnam pa thabs parkyen pa
154a6: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang lus so/ / yid nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang yid do// gzugs nyid rnam pa thams cad malen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad rakhyen pa nyid
154a7: kyang gzugs so/ / sgra nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhon pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang sgra'o// dri nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhar ba nyid kyang dri'o// ro nyid rnam pa thams cad
154a8: mkhyer ba ste/ rngam pa thabs cad mkhyen pa nyid kya raro// reg nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang reg go/ chos nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad pa/

154b1: da kyang nges so// mig gi rnal par shes pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang mig gi rnam par shes pa'o// rna ba'i rnam par shes pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/
154b2: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'o// sna'i rnam par shes pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang sna'i rnam par shes pa'o// lce'i rnam par shes pa
154b3: rngam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang lce'i rnam par shes pa'o// lus kyi rnam par shes pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa'i gang lus kyi la
154b4: par shes pa/ yid kyi rnam par shes pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang yid kyi rnam par shes pa'o// mig gi 'dus te reg pa nyid rnam pa thams ca mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa tha pas
154b5: capa mkhyen pa nyid kyang mig gi 'dus te reg pa'o/ / rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'o// sna'i 'dus te reg pa nying rnal pa thams cad pa
154b6: pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang snga'i 'dus te reg pa'o// lce'i 'dus te reg pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang lce'i 'dus te reg pa'o// lus kyi 'dus te dag
154b7: rngab pa thams cad mamer pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'o// yid kyi 'dus te reg pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ thal pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang yid ge 'du
154b8: dag pa'o/ / mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'o// rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis

155a1: tshor ba nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'o// sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba 'ang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/
155a2: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen po nyid kyang sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'o// lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhan pa nyid kyang lce'i 'dus te reg
155a3: 'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'o/ / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis rkang ba'o// yad kyi 'dus te dag
155a4: pa'i rkyen gyis tshong ba nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'o// sa'i khams nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa tha
155a5: kyang mkhan pa nyid kyangs khams so/ / rwa'i khams nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnab pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang chu'i khams so// me'i khams nyid dam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad
155a6: mnyam kyang pa' khams so/ / dag 'ams cad rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa sten pa pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang rlung gi khams so// nam mkha'i khams nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa cad kyang rnam
155a7: mkha' khams so/ / rnam par shes pa'i khams nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang rnam par shes pa'i khams so// ma rig pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa rnam
155a8: cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang ma rig pa'o/ / 'du byed nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang 'du byed do// rnam par shes pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen

155b1: pa nyid kyang rnam par shes pa'o/ / ming dang gzugs nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang ming dang gzugs so// skye mched drug nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad
155b2: mkhyen pa nyid kyang skye mched drug go/ / reg pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang reg pa'o// tshor ba nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid
155b3: kyang tshor ba'o/ / sred pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang sred pa'o// len pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang len pa'o// sing
155b4: pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang srid pa'o// skye ba nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang skye ba'o// rga shi nyid rnam pa thams cad
155b5: mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang rga shi'o// sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa'o// tshul khrims kyi
155b6: pha rol du phyin pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa'o// bzod pa'i pha rol du phyin pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa
155b7: thams dang mkhyen pa nyid kyang bzod pa'i pha rol du phyin pa'o/ / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol du phyin pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang brtson 'grus kyi pha rol du phyin pa'o// /
155b8: bsam gtan gyi pha rol du phyin pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang bsam gtan gyi pha rol du phyin pa'o// shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa nyid rnam pa thams cad

156a1: ma byen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa'o// nang stong pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang nang stong pa da de/ phyi stang
156a2: pa nyid rnam pa sems cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang byi stong pa nyid do// phyi nang stong pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang pa dang stong pa nyid /
156a3: stong pa'i stong pa nyi mapa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid do// chen po stong pa nyid rnab pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pamakhyen pa
156a4: kyang chen po stong pa nyid do/ / don dam pa stong pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang don dam pa stong pa nyid do// 'dus byas stong pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/
156a5: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang 'dus byas stong pa nyid do// 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid do// mtha' las 'a
156a6: pa stong pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid do// thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad
156a7: mkhyen pa nyid kyang thog nanas pa med pa stong pa nyid do/ / dor ba med pa stong pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang dor ba med pa stong pa nyid do// rang bzhin stong pa nyid rnam pa
156a8: thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid do// chos thams cad stong pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang chos thams cad stong pa

156b1: nyid do/ / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid do// mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams
156b2: cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid do/ / dngos po med pa stong pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang dngos po med pa stong pa nyid do// ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid rnam pa thams/
156b3: cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid do// dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid
156b4: stong pa nyid do/ / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnam so// yang dag par spong ba nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste rnam pa thams
156b5: cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang yang dag par spong ba rnams so/ / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams so// dbang po nyid rnam pa thams cad
156b6: mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang dbang po rnams so// stob pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang stobs rnams so// byang chub kyi yan lag nyid rnam pa thams cad
156b7: mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang byang chub kyi yan lag rnams so// 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang 'phags pa'i
156b8: lam yan lag brgyad pa'o/ / 'phags pa'i bden pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams so// bsam gtan nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa

157a1: thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang bsam gtan rnams so/ / tshad med pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang tshad med pa rnams so// gzugs sa pa' gams par 'jug
157a2: 'di rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams so// rnam par thar pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyer ba ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa
157a3: rnam par thar pa rnams so/ / mthar rgyas ga na pa'i ngoms par 'jug pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad 'khyen pa nyid kyang mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams so// na
157a4: thar pa'i mo stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma med pa dang smon pa med pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma med pa dang smon pa med pa'o//
157a5: par shes pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang mngon par shes pa rnams so// ting nge 'dzin nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang ting nge 'dzin
157a6: rnams so/ / gzungs kyi sgo nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang gzungs kyi sgo rnams so// de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams
157a7: maben pa nyid kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams so/ / mi 'jigs pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang mi 'jigs pa rnams so// so so yang dag par rig pa nyid
157a8: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang so so yang dag par rig pa rnams so// byams pa chen po nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid gar thams

157b1: chen po'o/ / deng rje chen po nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang snying rje cher po'o// sangs rgyas kyi chos pa 'dres pa nyid rnam pa thams cad maldan pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mnyan
157b2: nyid kyang sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams so/ / gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis sa med cing gnyis su
157b3: byar med do/ / tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med do// 'du shes kyi de bzhin nyid gang
157b4: yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med do// 'du byed kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa
157b5: kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med do// rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/
157b6: de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med do// mig gi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin cig pa ste/ gnyis su med cing
157b7: gnyis su byarang med do/ / rna ba'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su med cing gnyis su bar med do// snga'ang bzhidan nying gang yin
157b8: dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis bu med cing gnyis su byar med do// lce'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin

158a1: 'ong gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin 'di gcig pa ste/ gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med do// lus kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang bzhin nyid gang yin pa de na/ de bzhin
158a2: pas gsasam cad gnyis sa bar meng de/ / yid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su ma cing
158a3: gnyis su byang ba / / gzugs kyang bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su med cing gnyis su byang ba dang // snga'i da
158a4: nyid ga pa yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med do// dri'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
158a5: pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med do// ro'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid
158a6: gcig pa ste/ gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med do// reg gi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su med cing gnyis
158a7: byar med do/ / chos kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med do// mig gi rnam par shes pa'i
158a8: bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med do// rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin

158b1: pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis ma med cing gnyis su bar med do// sna'i rnam par shes pa pa rnam pa thams cad pa ldan
158b2: nyid de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med do// lce'i rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhan pa nyid kya dpa' nying gang yin
158b3: pa der de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su pad cing gnyis su byar med do// lus kyi rnam par shes pa'ang bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang/ de bzhin
158b4: nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su med cing gnas su bar med do// yid kyi rnam par shes pa'ade bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dan/ de bzhin nyid gcag
158b5: pa ste/ gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med do// mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis
158b6: su med cing gnyis su byar med do/ / rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su med cing gnyis
158b7: su byar med do/ / sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su med cing gnyis su bang med do//
158b8: lha'i 'dus te reg pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med do// lus kyi 'dus te

159a1: reg pa'i de bzhin ba dgang yin dpa'am pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang banan cidag yin pa dang / de bzhin cad b.rab pa/ bcoms ma cang gcams thang bad /
159a2: na ci gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad khyen pa 'ang kyang bzhin nyid gang yid pa dar/ nga bzhin cing gcig pa ste/ gnas su mang cing gnyisas kyang yang ngo // lag sa 'das te na
159a3: gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa 'a kyang babar nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnas su med cing gnyis sa byang pad // rna ba' 'das te dag pa'i rkyen gyis
159a4: ba 'ang gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa na/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med do// sna'i 'dus te dag pa'i rkyen gyis tsho 'dir
159a5: nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med do// lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba
159a6: bzhan nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med do// lus kyi 'dus te dag pa
159a7: bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su med cing gnyis su byang med do// yang kya 'dus te dag pa'argyan gyis
159a8: bzhin med gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med de// sa'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid gang na

159b1: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis sa par cing gnyis su byar med do// chu'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid gang yan pa dang / rnam pa thams cad
159b2: mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med // pa'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa'i dkyi de bzhin
159b3: nyi gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med do// rlung gi khams kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa da /
159b4: bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med do// nam mkha'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/
159b5: gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med do// rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su med cing
159b6: gnyis su byar med do/ / ma rig pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su med cang gnyis su byar med do// 'a
159b7: byed kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su med cing gnyis su bar med do// rnam par shes pa'i nga bzhin nyid gang
159b8: pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa da ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med do// mang dang gzugs kyang bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnab pa thams

160a1: cang mkhyenapa bzhin gang yin par ni/ de bzhin nying gcig pas/ gnas sam cang gnyis su bya ba nga // rtse mnad drug gang bzhin ta gang yin pa dang / rnam pathapas
160a2: kya de bzhin nyid gang yin pang ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnas su rad cang kyanyis su byang ma // reg pa' nga bzhin gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid par bsha gang
160a3: bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med do// tshar ba'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su ma
160a4: cing gnyis su byar med do/ / sred pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med do// len pa
160a5: bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med do// srid pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa
160a6: thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su med cing gnyis sa byar med do// skye ba'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang
160a7: gang yin pa de na/ de bzhin nyid gcag pa ste/ gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med do// rga shi'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid ba
160a8: pa ste/ gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med do// sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su

160b1: med cing gnyis su byang pa dang / / rdul khrims sa pa rol du phyin pa'ang bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin par na/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su med ca
160b2: gnas su bang pa / / bzang pa pa la du panapa da bzhan gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang bzhin nyid gang yin pa na/ dpazhan cing gcag pas/ gnyis su me cing gnyis
160b3: yangang / brdzun 'grus kyi par yar phyinapa'ang bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad maldan pa nyid kya bzhin cing gang phan pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pas/ sa su me cad gnyis pa
160b4: bsam pa'am par la du phyin pa nga bzhin pang gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin dang / de bzhin cing gcig sa/ gnyis sam ca gnyis su zang ma dang /
160b5: pha rol du phyin pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams ca mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcag paste/ gnyis su ma ca gnyis su byang ma dang // nang stong pa nyid kyi
160b6: nying gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhinanyid gang yin pa de na/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med do// bya snang pa nyid kyang bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam
160b7: thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa na/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su med cang gnyis su byang med do// byi na snang nyid ba de bzhin pang gang yin pa dang / rnam thams cad mkhan
160b8: kyi de bzhin gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med do// stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyi dag

161a1: d ag ga
161a2: su za med pa/ / ngang dus bstong pa nyid kyi bde ci gang yin pa dang / dam 'thabs dang byed pacang
161a3: gnyis su mer cing gnyis su bar med do/ / 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad khyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de de/ de ba zhi ming gcag pa
161a4: su med cing gnyis su byar med do/ / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su med cing
161a5: su byar med do/ / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med
161a6: do/ / theg ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med do//
161a7: ba med pa stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su med cing gnyis su bar med do// rang bzhin snyed
161a8: pa nyid de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med do// rtapra thams cad dang

161b1: bzhan da gang yin pa dang / dam pa thams cad bakhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med do// rang gan pa 'a rjed pa nyid kyi de bzhin da
161b2: pa dang / dam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su med cing gnyis su bar med do// ri dmigs pa snad pa nyid kyi de bzhin da ga yin pa dang /
161b3: pathams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de na/ de bzhin cing gcig paste/ gnyis su med cing gnyis su bar re du// dang pa mes bstang pa nyid kyi de bzhin kya gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thar
161b4: mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su med cing gnyis su bar med do// ngo bo nyid steng pa nyid sde de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi
161b5: pa'on nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med do// dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de
161b6: ba'i cang gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin 'a gcig pa ste/ gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med do// dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams kyi de bzhi bang gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mthar pa'ang gyi ba'i
161b7: ga yi pa ra/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med do// yang dag par spong ba rnams kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa'i dkyang ba' gang
161b8: ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med do// rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang de bzhin gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin

162a1: @#/ da gcig pa// / dbang ba rnams kyi de bzhin zhi gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams da na pa 'ad zhi 'dag
162a2: gnyis sa med cing gnyis su byang pa / / sa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi banan nyi gang yin pa de de/ de bzhi 'i gatheg pas/ gnyis su med
162a3: su byar med do/ / byang chub kyi yan pag rnams kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su med cing gnyis su 'a
162a4: 'phags pa'i yan lag brgyad pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med do// 'phags pa'i
162a5: bden pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med do// bsam gtan rnams
162a6: bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med de// tshad med pa rnams kyi de bzhin 'di
162a7: gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med do// gzugs med pa'i snyoms pa 'jug pa rnams
162a8: kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med do// rnam par thar pa rnams kyi de bzhin

162b1: nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams 'di nying gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid bag ste/ gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med do// ga pa'i spongs par 'jub
162b2: rnams kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar ma de// rnam da thar pa
162b3: nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang smon pa med pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste gnyis sa ma
162b4: su byar med do/ / mngon par shes pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su med cing gnyis su bya
162b5: med do/ / ting nge 'dzin rnams kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su med cing gnyis su bar med do// gzungs kyi
162b6: sgo rnams kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med do// de bzhin gshegs pa
162b7: stobs rnams kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rngam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su med cing gnyis su byed mang ngo // me 'jigs pa rnams
162b8: de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med do// so so yang dag par dag pa rnams kyi de bzhin

163a1: nyid gang yin pa dang / rnapa pa thacad pabed pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang len pa de/ de bzhin nyid gci pas/ gnyims med gangs su ba nga sa padang po
163a2: gang yin pa dang / rab phab pas da nga pyad pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su med cang ga mas byar med do// rje dpo'ang ba 'a 'ang gang yin par
163a3: dam pa thams cad lakhyen pa nyid thaM ba'ang nyid gang yin pa da/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su med cing gnyis su byas med do// sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams snang ba'ang dang gang yan par
163a4: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med do// rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / da pa
163a5: cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar meng ngo // lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad pa byed
163a6: nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med do// phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad pa byed pa shing kyi de bzhin
163a7: gang yin pa de de bzhin nying gcig pa ste/ gnyis su med cing gnyis su bar med do// dgra bcom pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyar ba zhin nyid gang yod par de/ dba'
163a8: ti gcig pa ste/ gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med do// rang byang chub kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang/ da bzhin nyid gcig pa/ ga

163b1: su med pang gnyis su byar med do/ / la phyin shes pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de na/ de bzhin nyid gzhag pa ste/ gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar/
163b2: med do// rgyun du zhugs pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad ma byed pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa da / de ba'an nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med do// lar cig phyir 'ong bar
163b3: de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med do// phyir mi 'ong ba'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa
163b4: thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med do// dgra bcom pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin
163b5: nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med do// rang sangs rgyas kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de de/ de bzhin nyid
163b6: gcig pa ste/ gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med do// byang chub sems dpa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yang bde na/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su med cing
163b7: gnyis su byar med do/ / sangs rgyas kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcag pa ste/ gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med do// zhes ston
163b8: pa ni/ 'di lta ste/ de bzhir gshegs pa rnapas kyi byang chub shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di zab cing blta dka' la/ khong du chud par dka' zhing / brtag du ma mchis la/ rtog gang spyad yul pa lags pa ste/ zhe she

164a1: bzhipa mo mkhas shing rtogs pas rig par bkye ba ste/ 'jig rten thams cad kyi su yid ches par dka' ba'o// bcom ldan 'das kyib 'angang ba na spyad pa dang / gzugs yang par byung ba'i rtsang bang dag la 'dzin
164a2: ces bka' stsal to/ / lha'i bu dag de bzhin no// de bzhin te/ lha'i bu dag gzugs nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang gzugs pa// tshor ba 'di rnam pa thabs pa mkhyen pa
164a3: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang tshor ba'o/ / 'du shes nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang 'du shes so// 'du bye 'ang rnab pa thams cad baben pa sa/ rnab pa thams ca
164a4: chen pa nyid kyang 'du byed do/ / rnam par shes pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang rnam par shes pa'o// mag nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams ca
164a5: mig go/ rna ba nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang rna ba'o// sna nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhan pa nyid kyang zhe'o// lce 'di rna ba
164a6: pa/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang lce'o// lus nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang lus so// yang nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam
164a7: pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang yang ngo / / gzugs nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang gzugs so// sgra nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa
164a8: da kyang sgra'o/ / dri nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang dri ro// ro nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang raro// ngag nyid rnam pa thams cad

164b1: mkhyen pa/ na'apa thams cang mkhyen pa nyid gag/ chom nyid rnapa pa thams cad sa khyed/ nas thamams na pata rgyas sa// zag garnam pa ga da thathams cad paldan pa/
164b2: rnam pa thams cad pa khyad pa nyid kyang tshig gi rnam par shes pa// rna ba'i rnam par shes pa da rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ca nga na rnam pa shas 'o// rdza' rnam pa
164b3: rnam pathams cad mkhyen paH/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang gA'i rnam par shes pa'o// lce'i rnam pa gas pa nyid rnam pathams ca mkhyen pa pa/ dam pathams pad mdzan shi kya lce rnam
164b4: par shes pa'o/ / lus kyi rnam par shes shing rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang lus kyi rnam par shes pa'o// yid kyi rnam par shes pa cid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa waM/
164b5: dam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yang yid mirnapa par shes pa'o// mig gi 'dus te reg pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad bakhyen pa nyid kyang mig gi 'dus te dag pa'o// rna ba'i 'dus
164b6: dag pa nyid rnam pathams cad baben pa sa/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang ra ba'i 'dus te reg pa'o// b+hU'i 'dus te reg pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang sna
164b7: pa'o/ / lci ba 'du pa nyi rnab pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang lce'i 'dus te reg pa'o// lus kyi 'dus te reg pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/
164b8: @ paldan pa nyid yang lu bya 'dus te dag pa// yid kyi 'dus te reg pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'o// lag gi 'dus

165a1: ta rag pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba nyid rab pa thams cad bldan pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang pag gi 'dus te dag pa gyun tha ba ra / rna pa dag pa'i ba
165a2: dang mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang na ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'o// sna'i 'dus te dag pa'i rkyen gas tshar ba da zab pa thams sa da pa dang bas
165a3: par 'dus te dag pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'o/ / lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkan kyis tshar ba nyid rnab pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang snang 'du ba byas la
165a4: te dag pa'i rgan batshar ba nyid rnam pa thabs cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang lus kyi 'dub te rag pa'i rkyen kyis tshang ba'o// yang sa 'dres pa
165a5: da rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkan gyis tshor ba'o/ / sa'i khams nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhan pa ste/ rnal thabs ca mkhan nyi
165a6: mkhan pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang chu'i khams so// me'i khams nyid rnam pa thams cad bakhyen pa ste/ rab pa thams ca maben pa'
165a7: rab pa thabs cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang rlung gi khams so/ / rab mkha'i khams nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhan pa ste/ rnam pa thabs cang mkhyen pa
165a8: rnab pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang rnam par shes pa'i khams so// ma rig pa nyid rnab pa thams cad mngon

165b1: rnam pa thab bcad mkhan pa nyid kyang ma dag pa'o/ / 'du byed nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pas/ rnab pa thams cad ma pa'i gang 'du ba dang // rnab par shes pa nyi rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste
165b2: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang rab par shes pa'o/ / mi dang gzugs nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnab pa thabs cad pa byed pa nyid kyang par dang gzugs so// skye bache dug nyid rnam pa thams cad
165b3: mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang sa mched drug go// reg pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang reg pa'o// tshar ba nyid rna sa thams cad mkhyen pa/
165b4: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang tshor ba'o// srid pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang sred pa'o// len pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams
165b5: cad maben pa nyid kyang len pa'o/ / srid pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang srid pa'o// skye ba nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid
165b6: ma pa'o/ / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang rga shi'o// sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa kye/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang
165b7: na po'i ba para'o/ / tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa'o// bzod pa'i pha rol du phyin pa nyid
165b8: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang bzod pa'i pha rol du phyin pa'o// brtson 'grus kyi pha rol du phyin pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang son/

166a1: 'grus kyi pha rol du phyin pa'o// bsam gtan gyi pa del du yin pa nyid rnam pa thams cad ma khyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang bsam gtanag pha rol du phyin pa'o// shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa nyid
166a2: ma pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhan pa nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pade// nang stong pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang nang stod pa nyid do//
166a3: snang pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang phyi stong pa nyid de// phyi na stong pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad sa khyen pa nyi bang phyi nang stong pa nyid do//
166a4: stong pa nyid stong pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid do// chen po stong pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang
166a5: chen po stong pa nyid do/ / don dam pa stong pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang don dam pa stong pa nyid do// 'dus byas stong pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams
166a6: cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang 'das byas stong pa nyid do/ / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid do// mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid
166a7: rnam pa thams cad pa pa/ mas cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid do// thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kya
166a8: thog pa dang tha ma med pa ster dor ba med pa stong pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang dor ba med pa stong pa nyid do// rang bzhin stong pa nyid rnam pa thams cad

166b1: byan pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid do// chos thams cad stong pa nyid rnam pan/ mas cang mkhyen pa nyid kyang chos thams cad sed pa nyid do// rag
166b2: mtshan da stong pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang jing gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid // mamasegs pa snya pa nyi na ma ma thams ca de la byen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa
166b3: kyang mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid do/ / dngos po med pa stong pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang dnges pa med pa stong pa nyidas so pa'i stong pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/
166b4: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid do// dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad ma yin pa nyid pa dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid do//
166b5: dra pa nye bar bdag yang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams so// yang dag par spong ba nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pas/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa
166b6: nyid gar yang dag par spang ba rnams so/ / 'phrul gyi rkang pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams so// dbang ponyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/
166b7: rnam pa thams maben pa nyid kyang dbang pan mas so// stobs nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang stobs rnams so// byang chub kyi yan lagacid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
166b8: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang byang chub kyi yan lag rnams so/ / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang 'phags pa'i lam yang lag

167a1: brgyad pa'o/ / 'phags pa'i bden pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhan pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang 'phags pa 'ab dang rnams se bsam gtan nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam
167a2: thams cad mkhyen pa nyid gang bsam gtan rnams so/ / tshad med pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhan pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang tshad med pa rnams so// gzugs med pa'i sems par 'jug pa nyid
167a3: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams so// rnam par thad pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid
167a4: rnam pa thab pa rnams so/ / mthar gis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhan pa nyid kyang mthar kyis gnas pa'i sems par 'jug pa rnams so/
167a5: sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma med pa dang smon pa med pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma med pa dang smon
167a6: pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad khyen pa nyid kyang mngon par shes pa rnams so// ting nge 'dzin nyid rnam pa thams cad mthar pas/ rnam pa thams cad
167a7: gzungs kyi sgo nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang gzungs kyi sgo rnams so// de bzhin gshegs pa'i stabs nyid rnam pa thams
167a8: mkhan pa nyid kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams so/ / mi 'jigs pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang mi 'jigs pa

167b1: rnams so/ / so so yang dag par rig pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang so so yang dag par rig pa rnams so// byams pa chen po tid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa
167b2: thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang byams pa chen po'o/ / snying rje chen po nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang snying rje chen po'o// sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa nyid rnam pa thams cad
167b3: mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad khyen pa nyid kyang sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams so// / shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa/ bam po nyis brgya nyi shu badran pa/ gzugs kyi de bzhin
167b4: nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med do// tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams
167b5: cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med do// 'du shes kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid
167b6: gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med do// 'du byed kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa ni/ de bzhin nyid gci/
167b7: pa ste/ gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med do// rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su med cing
167b8: gnyis su byar med do/ / mig gi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med do// rna ba'i de bzhin

168a1: nye dgang yin pa dang / ra pa thams cad pakhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de med bded nya yom su me ba me na dang yin pa dang / rnam
168a2: de nyid gang yin bde na/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su med cing gnyis su 'ang med de// lce de na nyer bang yin pa dang / dam pa mas 1
168a3: pa da/ nyis su med cing gnyis su byar med de// lus kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad bakhyen pa nyid kyi de bad nyid gang yin pa de da de bzhin dang gams su ya
168a4: do/ / yang kyang de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su med cing gnyis su ba 'dad
168a5: dang / rnam ber pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de do// de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med de// sgra'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / da thams cad mkhyen pa'i
168a6: zhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med do// dri'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin 'ang gang yin pade pa de bzhin nyid ba
168a7: su med cing gnyis su byar med do/ / de bzhidi nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su med ci gnas su byar med
168a8: reg gi de bzhin nyid gang yin ma dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med de// ches kyi de bzhin nyid gang yi

168b1: da rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ nyis su med ceng bas pa do// jig gi rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yid pa dang / rnam pa
168b2: med pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su med cing bshes su byar med de// rna bar rnam par shes par de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams dang mkhyen
168b3: da gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su med cing gnyis su bya ba med de// snang rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen panyid kya de bzhin nyi
168b4: yin pa deng / nga bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med de// lce'i rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa'id kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/
168b5: gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med do// lus kyi rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa
168b6: sas bya pang / / yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de ba'imatshad gcig pa ste/ gcis
168b7: su ga pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / dam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa den/ de ba'am 'ang gcag pa ste/ gnyis su med
168b8: nyes sa byar med do/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i 'ing nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pas/ gnyis su med cing ga'

169a1: @/ sa byar med do/ nas batham
169a2: byar med do/ / lce'i 'das te dag pa'i bzhin nying gang yi pa dgams pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang nyid yang pa ma bzhin dang gcag palnga/ gnas su ya cing
169a3: sa te reg pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yi pa dang / rnam pa thams cams khan nyid kyi bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gsas med cing gnas su byar yad // yid
169a4: 'bazhan nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig bkye/ gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med do// mig gi 'das te reg pa'i
169a5: rang bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin 'di gcig pa lnga/ gnyis su med cing gnyis sa par med do// raba'i 'das te dag pa'i
169a6: kyis rnyen pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med de// sna'i 'dus te dag pa'atan
169a7: tshar ba 'i bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su med cing gnyis su bar med do// lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis
169a8: raba'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med do// lus kyi 'das te dag pa'irkyen gyis

169b1: raba'i nga bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni// de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su ma bcing gnas sa byar med de// yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen
169b2: sachang ba'ang bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / ras pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi ban nyid gang yin pa de ni/ ra ba ni shing gcag pas/ gnams mang cang gnasas byar meng / sa pa kham kyang bzhin nyi
169b3: yang bang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nying bang bzhin nying gang yar pa de ni/ de bzhin nyi gcig pa ste/ gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med nga// chul khams kyi ba'an yang gang yin pa dang / rnas pa thams cad mkhyen
169b4: kyang ba nying gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med do// me'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad maldan pa byer ba'in nga gang yid pa der/
169b5: gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med do// rlung gi khams kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ra// de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis
169b6: nam mkha'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de gzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gas su med cing gnyis su byar
169b7: kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su med cing ga la su bang mang ngo // ba
169b8: thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med de// 'du byed kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam

170a1: nyid gang yin pa dang / dad nyid gcig paste/ gnyis su med cing gnyis rnam par shes pa'i de bzhi nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad
170a2: pabyed pa nyid med pa'id 'ang gang yin pa da / / de bzhin nyid gcagaste/ gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med do// ming dang gzu byung ba'ang nyid gang yid pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid
170a3: bzhin nyid gang yin pa ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med do// bye mched drug pa de bzhin nyi gang yin par ma rnam pa thams cad pa byed pa da kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin par
170a4: bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su med cing gnyis su bar med do// reg pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de ba'i gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis
170a5: da nyid gnyis ku byar med do/ / tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste gnas su med cing gnyis su byar med do//
170a6: bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med do// len pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang /
170a7: pabyer pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa da ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med do// srid pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yon pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid
170a8: de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med do// skye ba'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/

170b1: sa su dang dag na pa dang / rnam thathams cakyang pa'ang yang gang man pa dang cad gcig pa ste/ gnyis su rang cing gnyis su /
170b2: srid pa'i pha rol du phyin pa'i de bzhin 'du gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid na nyid grar yin pa dran/ de bzhin nyid gcags me cing gnyis su byar med do// rdul khrims
170b3: pha rol du phyin pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid par yid pade ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su med cing gnyis su bar med do// bzong po'i pha rol du
170b4: phyin pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yid pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med do// brtson 'grus kyi pha rol du
170b5: phyin pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med do// bsam gtan gyi pha rol du phyin pa'i
170b6: de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rngam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med do// shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa
170b7: dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med do// nang stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams
170b8: da ma med pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med do// phyi stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi

171a1: bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ / de bzhin nyid gcig bas/ gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med do// na pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa'ang byung bzhin dag
171a2: yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su med cing gnyis su byang med do// stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnas pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de na/ ngo bzhin
171a3: nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med do// chen po stong pa nyid kyang bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa den/ de bzhin nyid gcig
171a4: gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med do/ / don dam pa stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin par ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su ma
171a5: cing gnyis su byar med do/ / 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su med cing gnyis sa
171a6: kyang med do/ / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar mang ngo //
171a7: mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa tha mthun pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su me cing gnyis su bar med do// thog mar
171a8: tham med pa stong pa nyid kying de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med do// dong ba med pa

171b1: stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig paste/ gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med do// rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin gyi
171b2: yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med do// chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam
171b3: pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med do// rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad
171b4: mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med do// mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid

171b6: nade bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su med cing gnyis su bar med do// ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig
171b7: pa ste/ gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med do// dngos po meng pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig
171b8: pa ste/ gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med do// dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de na/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis

172a1: su med cing gnyis su bar med do/ / yang dag par spong ba rnams kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa me/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa
172a2: med cing gnyis su byar med do/ / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su mang cang gnyis
172a3: dar med do/ / dbang po rnams kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med do// skab
172a4: rnams kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid ga pa yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med do// byang chub kyi yan lag rnams kyi de bzhin nyid
172a5: gas yin pa dang / rnam pa thams ca mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med do// 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i de bzhin nyid
172a6: gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med do// 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam
172a7: thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med do// bsam gtan rnams kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de
172a8: bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med do// tshad med pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de

172b1: bzhin nyid gcig sa gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med do/ / gzugs med pa'i sems par 'jug pa rnams kyi de bzhin cid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyi gang yin par
172b2: de bzhin nyid gcig paste/ gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med do// rnam par thar pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thamasacad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin 'di ni/ de bzhin da
172b3: pa ste/ gnyis med ning gnyis su byar med do// mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gces/
172b4: pa ste/ gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med do// rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin par mi/
172b5: bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med do// mngon par shes pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/
172b6: gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med do// ting nge 'dzin rnams kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar
172b7: med do/ / gzus kyi sgo rnams kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med do// da pa'i na gshegs
172b8: ba'i stobs rnams kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med do// mi 'jigs pa rnams kyi de bzhin

173a1: nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med do// so so yang dag par rig pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid ga
173a2: yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med do// byams pa chen po'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
173a3: pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med do// snying rje chen po'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyir bzhin nyid gang yin pa
173a4: de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med do// sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin
173a5: nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis sa med cing gnyis su byar med do// rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ ga
173a6: su med cang gnyis su bya ba med do/ / lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su med cing gnyis
173a7: su byar med do/ / phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad bakhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med do// dgra
173a8: bcom pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med do// rang byang chub kyi de bzhin nyid

173b1: kyi de bzhidu nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su med cing gnyis su bar med do// lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyi de bzhir nyid gang 'i
173b2: pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyidagang yin pa de ni/ de bzhi nyid gcigaste/ gnyis su med cing gnyis su byur med do// rga nangadu zhugs pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / pa
173b3: thams cadapa mas pad thar bzhin nyid gang yin pa de na/ de ba'i nanyid gcig pas/ gas gnyis su byar me dado// lan cig phyir 'di ba'i de bzhan 'ad gang yin pa dang
173b4: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa den/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med do// phyir mi 'ong ba'i de bzhin nyid gang yin par
173b5: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pakyang bzhin nyid gang yin pa de na de ba' ngatha sa mang sa su byar med do/ / dgra bcom pa'i ba'ang nying gang yin pa dang napa pa thams cad ma lda
173b6: deba'an cing gang yin pa dang / rabaze ci gcig pa ste/ gnyis sa med cing gnyis sa ca pa dang // rang sa rgyas kyang bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnal pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yid pa
173b7: na 'ang bcag pa ste/ gnyis sul bzeng gnyis su byar med do// byang chubs pas dpa'i de bzhin dgang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa don/ de bzhin nyid gcig
173b8: pa ste/ gnyis su med cang gangs su med do// sangs rgyas kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su med tsa

174a1: gnyis su byur med do/ / lha'i bdag don gyis dbang de gzigs pas/ de bzhin gshegs pa 'tshan las chud pal grags gsos / sa pa// pal ma tham yi no// de can phyi zhen/ 'das
174a2: de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi chos byang chub 'di ni bab cing bka/ dka' la/ khong du chud par dka' zhing brtag tu med la/ rtog ga'i spyod yums yin te/ gzhing za ba zhib po mkhas shing rtogs pas/
174a3: bya ba 'jig rten thams cad kyis yid ches par dka' ba ste/ de ni sras kyang mngon par sangs margyas/ nam yang mngon par sangs mi rgya gang yang mngon par sangs ma N+Das te/ grang la gnyis sa kun nas @
174a4: pa de ni chos rnams kyi zab pa nyid do/ / lha'i bu dag nam mkha' zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab po// lha'i bu dag de bzhin nyid zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo// lha'i bu dag chos kyi dbyings zab pa'i phyir chos 'datha
174a5: lha'i bu dag yang dag pa'i mtha' zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab po/ / lha'i bu dag bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo// lha'i bu dag mtha' yas mu med pa zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab po/
174a6: lha'i bu dag 'ong ba dang 'gro ba med pa zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo// lha'i bu dag mi ste mi 'dapa dang / mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa med pa zab pa'i phyir mos 'di zab bo// lha'i bu dag kun nas nyon mongs pa
174a7: med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med pa dang / mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa med pa zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab po// lha'i bu dag mngon par 'du bya ba med pa dang sa langon par rdzogs par byang chub pa med pa
174a8: zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab po/ / lha'i bu dag bdag zab pa'i phyir ches 'di zab po/ lha'i bu dag sems can zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab po// lha'i bu dag srog zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab po// lha'i bu dga'agro ba/

174b1: zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab po// lha'i bu dag gso ba zab pa'i phyir chos 'dis so// lha'i bu dag skyes bu zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab po// lha'i bu dag gang zag zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zad po// lha'i bu dag shed can zab pa'i phyir chos
174b2: 'di zab po/ / lha'i bu dag shed pa dag zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab po// lu'i bu dag byed pa po phyir chos 'di zababo// lha'i bu dag tshe rab po zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab po// lha'i bu dag shes pa po zab pa'i phyir chos 'di
